mapper.select: SELECT r.idx AS reservation_idx , r.user_idx , r.partner_idx , r.room_idx , r.guest_cnt , r.check_in_date , r.check_out_date , r.price , (SELECT check_in FROM PARTNER WHERE idx = r.partner_idx) AS check_in_time , (SELECT check_out FROM PARTNER WHERE idx = r.partner_idx) AS check_out_time , (SELECT url FROM IMAGE WHERE mapping_idx = r.partner_idx AND type = 'P' AND thumbnail_yn = 'Y') AS image , (SELECT name FROM USER WHERE idx = r.user_idx) AS name FROM RESERVATION r WHERE r.idx = #{reservation_idx} AND r.user_idx = #{user_idx}

SELECT r.idx AS reservation_idx , (SELECT name FROM PARTNER WHERE idx = r.partner_idx) AS partner_name , r2.room_type , r.check_in_date , r.check_out_date , DATE_FORMAT(r.reservation_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reservation_date_format , r.price , r.payment_status , (SELECT url FROM IMAGE WHERE mapping_idx = r.partner_idx AND type = 'P' AND thumbnail_yn = 'Y') AS image FROM RESERVATION r JOIN ROOM r2 ON r.room_idx = r2.idx WHERE r.user_idx = #{user_idx}
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION r JOIN ROOM r2 ON r.room_idx = r2.idx WHERE r.user_idx = #{user_idx}
